project.name: |-- 006-finding-and-matching
project.description:
Keywords: + Streams + Optional + Matching operations: anyMatch, allMatch, noneMatch + Finding operations: findAny, findFirst
This project includes very simple examples that illustrate how to perform different operations with streams.
MatchingRunner: Illustrates the use of anyMatch, allMatch and noneMatch.
FindingRunner: Illustrates the use of findAny and findFirst. It also demonstrates the use of Optional.
